title: Elitism in America
itunes:title: Elitism in America
description: Much of the criticism of liberals after the 2016 election revolved around coastal elites and the media being disconnected from white working class Americans. Are the "Blue Coasts" still mocking the flyover states -- and helping empower Trump in the process?
itunes:summary: Much of the criticism of liberals after the 2016 election revolved around coastal elites and the media being disconnected from white working class Americans. Are the "Blue Coasts" still mocking the flyover states -- and helping empower Trump in the process?
media:description: Much of the criticism of liberals after the 2016 election revolved around coastal elites and the media being disconnected from white working class Americans.
author: webmaster@kcrw.org (KCRW)
itunes:author: KCRW
itunes:keywords: Akayed Ullah,chain migration,President Trump,classism,expertise,resentment,Kirsten Gillibrand,sexual harassment,Alabama senate race,Roy Moore,Anti-semitism
